subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The Transit antlib provides a set of low-level tasks that deliver the bootstrap functionality needed to load dynamic extensions. The Transit antlib includes an import, get, and plugin tasks. The plugin task is used to load antlibs, taskdefs, typedefs and build listeners using classloaders established relative from Transit plugin descriptors. The import task provides support for the inclusion of local or remote build templates. The get task provides support for the retrieval of remote resources using artifact references and the mapping of cached files to project properties.
